      • allSquaresNoMove

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> allSquaresNoMove()
        This method check all the possible square where the owner can move from his original position.
        Returns:
        a list of coordinates of the available squares

      • basicMode

        public void basicMode(ColorId colorPlayerTarget,
                      java.lang.String squareCoordinatesAsStringPlayertoMove,
                      java.lang.String squareCoordinatesAsStringTargetToMove,
                      boolean withFragWar)
        This method implements the basic mode of the weapon.
        Parameters:
        colorPlayerTarget - is the target of the basic mode
        squareCoordinatesAsStringPlayertoMove - are the coordinates as string for the square where the player decided to move
        squareCoordinatesAsStringTargetToMove - are the coordinates as string of the square where the target has to be moved
        withFragWar - is a boolean to indicate if use or not the additional "with fragmenting grenade mode"

      • checkWithFragmentingWarhead

        public boolean checkWithFragmentingWarhead()
        This method will check if the shooter can use the tagback grenade (there have to be at least 2 targets in asquare, 1 for the basic mode and 1 additional to activate the tagback)
        Returns:
        a boolean flag

      • checkWithFragmentingWarheadRocketJump

        public boolean checkWithFragmentingWarheadRocketJump()
        This method will check if the tagback mode is available after the target moves with the rocket jump.
        Returns:
        a boolean flag.

      • checkRocketJumpColors

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ColorId>> checkRocketJumpColors()
        This method will trasform the square and player of the rocket jumop hashmap into strings and colorids.
        Returns:
        an hashmap of strings as keys and colorids as target for this mode
